title:
This question concerns turning right on a red arrow.  Is that allowed under North Carolina law?  At 17th Street, turning right onto College Road (going south), there are two right-hand turn lanes.  Is it okay to turn right on a red arrow from the inside lane?



Judy Pierce
text:
Under N.C. law, it is legal to make a right turn on a red light
UNLESS there is a sign that specifically states no turn on red.""
